title: Number of assaults by weapon U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
The Number of assaults is highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
The Number of assaults of Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument is 1.82% smaller than the maximum value at Other weapon.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Weapon used, and Number of assaults in each Weapon used on the y axis.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
The Number of assaults is highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
The Number of assaults of Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument is 1.82% smaller than the maximum value at Other weapon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.
The second highest Number of assaults is appeared to be the Weapon used Firearm.
Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument has 1.82 times less Number of assaults than Weapon used Other weapon which is the highest.
Number of assaults at Weapon used Other weapon is 223997.0 , second place is Firearm at 185437.0, and thirdly is Personal weapons at 179008.0.
Considered together, the average Number of assaults in all 4 Weapon useds is roughly 177923.75.
Summing up the values of all Weapon useds, we get total 711695.0.
